## How to participate in the discussion forum?

Discussion forums provide staff and learners a place to have discussions and
collaborations online. Course managers can also use the discussion forum as a
place to publish announcements to learners. Each course has one discussion
forum. Now let’s see how Andy will participate in the discussion forum in
Curricula.

#### Publish a topic in the discussion forum

Andy has some questions for the course "Certified Quality Engineer". He wants
to create a topic to discuss with the trainer and other learners. Let’s see
how Andy will publish a topic.

1\. In Curricula, Andy clicks **Course** on the left navigation pane.

2\. He finds the course "Certified Quality Engineer", clicks the More actions
button, and then clicks Discussion forum. He can see all topics in the forum
on the **Discussion forum** page.

3\. Andy clicks **Create topic**.

4\. In the **Create topic** panel, he fills in the topic information and
clicks **Save**.

#### Post a comment in the discussion forum

Andy wants to post his comments on a topic, as well as reply to the ideas of
the trainer or other learners. Let’s see how Andy will post comments.

1\. In Curricula, Andy clicks **Course** on the left navigation pane.

2\. He finds the course "Certified Quality Engineer" and clicks the discussion
forum icon. He can see all topics in the forum on the **Discussion forum**
page.

3\. Andy finds the topic that he wants to reply to, and then clicks the topic
title.

4\. He enters the comment and clicks **Post**.

***Note** : If Andy wants to reply to other users’ comments, he can locate a
user’s reply and post his comments.
